sentence.text: Here we report a patient with a congenital syndrome consisting of severe global developmental delay, microcephaly, heart defects, failure to thrive and liver disease with a previously unreported homozygous NM_015352.1: c.485CAAAAT variant (p.Ser162Leu) in protein O-linked glycosylation detected by exome sequencing.

These results suggest that this N-glycan of protein O-linked glycosylation is not required for its proper enzymatic function, and that the p.Ser162Leu mutation of protein O-linked glycosylation likely causes global developmental delay, microcephaly with vascular and cardiac defects
